items.content_html: @orwoods/networking is a lightweight npm library designed for rapid and seamless setup of gRPC clients and servers in Node.js. It includes one-command generation of build files from .proto files, with full TypeScript support for streamlined development.
items.title: orwoods/networking: @orwoods/networking is a lightweight npm library designed for rapid and seamless setup of gRPC clients and servers in Node.js. It includes one-command generation of build files from .proto files, with full TypeScript support for streamlined development.

items.content_html: plumber-auth is a lightweight Express.js middleware for seamless Auth0 integration, providing secure JWT validation and credential management. It ensures reliable authentication with customizable error handling and logging for modern web applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A JavaScript package for generating league tables from match data, with customizable sorting options and detailed explanations of tiebreaker application available in both text and raw data formats.
